actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain lands to the Natchez Trace Parkway in Mississippi.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to purchase not more than 200 acres of land and interests in land comprising the Springfield Plantation and vicinity in Jefferson County Mississippi. Designates such lands and interests acquired under this Act to be a part of the Natchez Trace Parkway. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain lands to the Natchez Trace Parkway in Mississippi.
